word:
MR No. 1066 - Building God's House To Be Given First Consideration

(Written August 17, 1897, to Brother Hare, from "Sunnyside," Cooranbong, NSW) 


     I must speak to you, Brother Haskell, Brother Hughes, Brother Wilson, and Brother Daniells. When we parted with you last evening, I said, We will not hasten the building of the meeting house; but last night has changed my ideas materially. [Haggai 1:2-8, quoted.]
